allFoodItems.description: Fresh avocado on toasted sourdough bread.
Poached eggs served on English muffins with hollandaise sauce.
Fluffy waffles served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
Buttermilk pancakes served with butter and maple syrup.
Scrambled eggs, bacon, cheese, and salsa wrapped in a flour tortilla.
Scrambled eggs, black beans, avocado, and salsa served over brown rice.
Thick slices of bread dipped in egg batter and pan-fried, served with powdered sugar and syrup.
Poached eggs served on English muffins with spinach and hollandaise sauce.
Fluffy egg omelette with your choice of fillings (cheese, ham, peppers, onions, mushrooms).
Scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, bacon, and cheese topped with avocado and salsa.

allDrinkItems.description: Sparkling wine mixed with orange juice.
Vodka mixed with tomato juice and spices, garnished with celery and olives.
Strong black coffee made by forcing steam through finely-ground coffee beans.
Espresso mixed with steamed milk and topped with frothed milk.
Freshly squeezed orange juice served over ice.
Hot coffee spiked with Irish whiskey and topped with whipped cream.
Espresso mixed with steamed milk and a small amount of frothed milk.
Chilled black tea served over ice with lemon wedges.
Blended mixture of spinach, kale, banana, apple, and almond milk.
